Name: 天下镖局
About the game: ·The leader of the alliance died, the Jianghu was in turmoil, and the undercurrent surged among various forces ·Each branch climbs high, each takes what he needs, and the escort sect colludes with each other ·One family dominates the market and bullies the people. It is a disaster to Wulin ·Break through the darkness, help chivalry, and reshape the glory of the escort agency in the past ·Hundreds of escorts, thousands of martial arts ·A variety of combination strategies to create a unique dart team that only belongs to you ·Bodyguards make money and show their powers ·The constantly evolving dynamic Jianghu is difficult to distinguish between enemies and friends ·An open gun is easy to hide, but an arrow in the dark is hard to defend ·If the escort is out, don't try to be fierce ·Pure slang, build relationships and avoid unnecessary fighting ·Immerse yourself in development, protect yourself and escort the world ·Make hegemony with martial arts, cover the sky with one hand and unify the Jianghu ·He is famous for his virtue and makes friends all over the world
